name: set_gas_burner_efficiency

arguments.name: object
arguments.display_name: Choose an Air Loop with a two speed DX Cooling Unit to Alter

arguments.name: remove_costs
arguments.display_name: Remove Baseline Costs From Effected Cooling Coil DX Two Speed Units

arguments.name: material_cost
arguments.display_name: Material and Installation Costs per Cooling Coil DX Two Speed Unit

arguments.name: demolition_cost
arguments.display_name: Demolition Costs per Cooling Coil DX Two Speed Unit

arguments.name: demo_cost_initial_const
arguments.display_name: Demolition Costs Occur During Initial Construction

arguments.name: om_cost
arguments.display_name: O & M Costs per Cooling Coil DX Two Speed Unit

modeler_description_xml: Loop through air loops in the building and find and change the burner efficiency of any OS:Coil:Heating:Gas objects you find. Note the pre-adjusted efficiency and also the name of the loop. For the starting condition note the range of efficiency values for the units, and for the final condition do the same, to confirm that they were all changed.
description_xml: This measure will find Coil Heating Gas units in the model and will alter the burner efficiency to a specified value. It can be run on a single or all air loops in the model.
